sect1.title: Setting up U2F
sect1.para: To set up U2F on your &slem; system, you need to first register your Yubikey. During the registration process a new key pair is created, you obtain the private key and the public key is registered with the online service. After you register your Yubikey, you need to map the obtained token to your accouny on &slema;.
